description: Represents storage that is managed by an external CSI volume driver (Beta feature)

controllerPublishSecretRef.description: SecretReference represents a Secret Reference. It has enough information to retrieve secret in any namespace

name.description: Name is unique within a namespace to reference a secret resource.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within which the secret name must be unique.

driver.description: Driver is the name of the driver to use for this volume. Required.

fsType.description: Filesystem type to mount. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Ex. "ext4", "xfs", "ntfs".

nodePublishSecretRef.description: SecretReference represents a Secret Reference. It has enough information to retrieve secret in any namespace

name.description: Name is unique within a namespace to reference a secret resource.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within which the secret name must be unique.

nodeStageSecretRef.description: SecretReference represents a Secret Reference. It has enough information to retrieve secret in any namespace

name.description: Name is unique within a namespace to reference a secret resource.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within which the secret name must be unique.

readOnly.description: Optional: The value to pass to ControllerPublishVolumeRequest. Defaults to false (read/write).

volumeAttributes.description: Attributes of the volume to publish.

volumeHandle.description: VolumeHandle is the unique volume name returned by the CSI volume plugin’s CreateVolume to refer to the volume on all subsequent calls. Required.
